name: ArtifactoryToolsInstaller
description: Installs tools necessary for artifactory integration tasks.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service for tools download and installation.

inputs.name: cliInstallationRepo
inputs.label: Install JFrog CLI from:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the repository from which the JFrog CLI will be downloaded and installed.
The repository has to be of type Remote (or Virtual that includes a Remote), pointing to "https://jfrog.bintray.com/jfrog-cli-go/".

inputs.name: installMavenExtractor
inputs.label: Install Maven Extractor
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to make the JFrog Cli install the Maven Extractor from Artifactory.

inputs.name: mavenInstallationRepo
inputs.label: From:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the repository from which the Maven Extractor will be downloaded and installed.
The repository has to be of type Remote (or Virtual that includes a Remote), pointing to "http://jcenter.bintray.com".
